page.title: 14TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: To find out about the cars in our area we made a survey of cars that were parked or travelling during one afternoon.Nearly one car in every three that we saw was made by ford.The Escort was the most popular car.The second most popular was the Vauxhall Cavalier.We had expcted to see many Datsuns but did not.We saw seven taxis.Although we were looking at cars we were surprised by the high number of lorries and vans that were using roads,almost as many as cars.About a quarter of the cars we saw were less than two years old.One car in every six was more than ten years old,and the oldest was E registerd,about eighteen years old.Most cars were travelling too fast.
